architecture_description:
This high-level architecture represents a Node.js web application built with the Express framework. The application is containerized using Docker, as indicated by the presence of a Dockerfile and Makefile. The CI/CD pipeline is managed by GitHub Actions, which automates the build and deployment process using the build.yml workflow. There is also a reference to potential cloud infrastructure provisioning via Terraform (terraform.yml), though no specific Terraform directory was found, so this is marked as a potential resource. The relationships are as follows:

- The Express/Node.js web application is containerized using Docker.
- The Docker container is built and deployed through the CI/CD pipeline managed by GitHub Actions.
- The CI/CD pipeline may also provision or manage cloud infrastructure using Terraform, if configured.

This architecture ensures a modern, automated deployment process with the flexibility to extend into cloud infrastructure management.
